string-array.name: rulesLongCircleOfDeath
string-array.item: All players must drink a sip.
The player who draws this card must drink two sips.
The player who draws this card must drink three sips.
The player who draws this card must drink four sips.
The player who draws this card must drink five sips.
The player who draws this card must drink six sips.
The player who draws this card must say something he already did or never done. All the other players must drink one sip if they are not in the case of the player.

The player who draws this card start the game by saying \"In my suitcase, I have \" and add an object or a person. The next player must add another object and so on until one of the players forget the contents of the suitcase.
The player who draws this card say a word. The other players must say another word rhyming with the first one until one of them fail.
The player who draws this card choose a theme (ex : brands). Every player must choose a valid word.
The player who draws this card can say \"Snake eyes !\" if he looks right into the eyes of another player. That player must drink one sip.
The player who draws this card tries to get people to answer his question. If one of them answer, the player must drink (this applies until another player draws a queen).
The player who draws this card make up a new rule until the end of the game.

string-array.name: rulesLongBizkit
string-array.item: You choose a player. He must drink a sip.
The current player is the \"Biscuit\". Whenever the number three appears on a dice, he must drink a sip until another player take his place. Also he must drink a sip right now.
The player that played before you must drink a sip.
The current player must drink a sip.
The next player must drink a sip.
Everyone must put their thumb on their forehand and yell \"Bizkit\"!. The last one must drink a sip.
All the players must drink a sip
The player that played before you must drink a sip.
The current player must drink a sip.
The next player must drink a sip.
The current player is the "Great Master". Everyone must call him this way otherwise they must drink a sip. He also create a new rule for this game.
